Class SmartTable

                      com.threerings.gwt.ui.SmartTable
All Implemented Interfaces:
HasClickHandlers, HasHandlers, EventListener, HasWidgets, SourcesTableEvents, Iterable<Widget>
public class SmartTable
extends FlexTable

Extends FlexTable with a number of extremely useful utility methods.

Nested Class Summary
 class SmartTable.CellMutator
          Performs a number of convenient modifications on a cell, each returning the mutator instance for very legible chaining of modifications.

addText

public int addText(Object text,
                   int colSpan,
                   String... styles)
Adds text to the bottom row of this table in column zero, with the specified column span and style.

Parameters:
text - an object whose string value will be displayed.
Returns:
the row to which the text was added.

addWidget

public int addWidget(Widget widget,
                     int colSpan,
                     String... styles)
Adds a widget to the bottom row of this table in column zero, with the specified column span and style.

Returns:
the row to which the widget was added.

setStyleNames

public void setStyleNames(int row,
                          int column,
                          String... styles)
Configures the specified style names on the specified row and column. The first style is set as the primary style and additional styles are added onto that.
